sources.title: 100° Below Zero | Full Action Disaster Movie | Jeff Fahey | John Rhys-Davies
sources.description:
100° Below Zero - When a chain of volcanic eruptions rips through Europe, the enormous ash cloud blocks out the sun, plunging the continent into a new ice age. An American couple must find their kids and get them out of Paris before it freezes over.
**Under license from The Asylum.  All rights reserved**
2013.  Stars: Jeff Fahey, Sara Malakul Lane, Marc Ewins, John Rhys-Davies

*SUBSCRIBE to MOVIE CENTRAL!* - https://bit.ly/3mRDJox
